channel.title: Gci on choyin

item.title: FOSSASIA and Google Code-in 2015
item.description:
Officially joining the FOSSASIA community with me added to the FOSSASIA Google Code-in 2015 website!! Completing Tasks are loads of fun Here’s a program to see if you are old enough to drink:

print("Are you old enough to drink?")

age = int(input("Please enter your age: "))

drinkingage = int(18)
whencanidrink = drinkingage - age


if age >= drinkingage:
  print("You can drink, congratulations!")

elif 1 < age < drinkingage:
  print("You cannot drink, but you can in " + str(whencanidrink) + " years!")

else:
  print("Your age is not recognizable by us!!")

If you are between 13 and 17 years old you should join Google Code-in right here. Dont hesitate, contributing to the Open Source Community is fun!

EDIT (29/12/2015): Below are repositories to all the tasks I have completed: (Tasks will be added here when I complete them) - Javascript: Lights Out! - Website: Host a website with Jekyll on github using github pages - Hugo: Deploy a blog using Hugo Github pages. - Website: Add your photo to the GCI FOSSASIA Site Student Section and Tweet about it - Python: Your first program in an open source ide - Website: Add a “Thank you for contributing” in another language to the FOSSASIA GCI website - Website: Get Geolocation from browser
